item.title: Future iPhones Could Adopt Superior Tandem OLED Display Tech
item.description: Apple is planning to bring tandem-structure OLED panels to its iPhone lineup in the coming years, which would bring over some of the display improvements currently exclusive to Apple’s M4 iPad Pro mod

item.title: Future iPhones Could Adopt Superior Tandem OLED Display Tech
item.description: Apple is planning to bring tandem-structure OLED panels to its iPhone lineup in the coming years, which would bring over some of the display improvements currently exclusive to Apple’s M4 iPad Pro mod
